metadata.description:
We are a community of music lovers born through Sound. 

Our goal here is simple: unite the world by making them DANC3.

Our first tape was mixed by serboy, a friend and artist from Istanbul, Turkey whose passion for music is so crazy we had to remix it and release it onto our favorite minting site.

A message from serboy to the artists featured on this mixtape: 

"Thank you for the most beautiful vocals in the world"

And according to our lead curator Rae/Arella (uh-ray-luh): 

“Listening to the DANC3 mixtape will get you laid” 

here we go...

Tracklist 
0:00 serboy - CRAZY
0:14 bloody white - showbiz!
0:20 ASTRO - Runaway
0:22 LNRZ Team - CR4ZY
0:32 TWERL - WTF (NOISE)
0:35 Vivid Fever Dreams - Reality Benders Genesis (with Toha and grungysweater)
0:54 Daz Merchant - Medicine (featuring Reo Cragun)
1:09 LNRZ - Lemme Go (Marian Hill x Mark Johns)
1:21 Snoop Dogg - I Can't Breathe
metadata.name: DANC3 Mixtape (CRAZY) #1
metadata.title: DANC3 Mixtape (CRAZY)
